title: The Best of RISK! Music #12
description:
Our twelfth collection of our favorite music from the most recent RISK! episodes.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Chappo, The Rumble Strips, Black Joe Lewis & The Honeybears, Dylan LeBlanc, Bhi Bhiman, Brett Dennen, Morningbell, Wheeland Brothers, Herizen Guardiola, Nile Rodgers, The Americanos, Vampire Weekend, The Staple Singers, Max Jury, The Revivalists, The Walkmen, Grace Potter, Radiohead, Kevin Allison, Amos Lee, The Heavy, Crystal Fighters, Iron & Wine and Calexico, Madcon, Gary Clark Jr., Bear Mountain)
